title: Dating for Men
subtitle: Approach, connect, and build real relationships
description: A grounded approach to dating for men—no manipulation, no games, no pretending to be someone you're not. This course covers approaching with confidence, genuine conversation, reading signals, handling rejection, and building connections that could actually go somewhere.

modules.title: Your Relationship with Women
modules.description: Examining your beliefs, fears, and patterns

modules.title: Grounded Masculinity
modules.description: Strength without aggression, presence without performance

modules.title: Reading Signals
modules.description: Understanding interest, disinterest, and everything between

modules.title: From Dating to Relationship
modules.description: When and how to move forward

whatYouLearn: Examine and update your beliefs about women and dating
Approach women with confidence and respect
Have genuine conversations that create connection
Handle rejection without it destroying you
requirements: Attraction Fundamentals or solid understanding of what creates connection
Willingness to face fears and take action

questions.question: What is 'grounded masculinity'?
options: Strength and presence without aggression or performance

questions.question: What makes an approach 'creepy' vs confident?
options: Whether you're respecting her autonomy, reading signals, and not being attached to outcome

questions.question: What's more important than impressing someone in conversation?
How should you handle rejection?
options: Keep trying until she says yes
Understand it's usually not personal, feel the disappointment, and move on with dignity
Get angry and show her what she's missing

questions.question: What's the key to reading signals accurately?
options: Pay attention to body language, verbal cues, and energy—and respect what you see
